note.p: Death: Fort William, Calcutta, India (04 September 1842)

Memberships: FGS; Asiatic Society of Bengal; Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland; Medical and Physical Society of Calcutta; Agricultural & Horticultural Society of India; Statistical Society of London (corresponding); MRCS; Royal Horticultural Society of Cornwall (honorary)
Notes: One word of citation scraped away. 'Dated...1841' in different hand (appears to be PM Roget FRS, Secretary RS)
